Mackinac Bridge

Address: I 75 Location: N/A, Michigan 49781

About This Attraction

The Mackinac Bridge ( MAK-É™-naw; also referred to as the Mighty Mac or Big Mac) is a suspension bridge that connects the Upper and Lower peninsulas of the U.S.
